mapper.insert: INSERT INTO las_member (id, pw, name, birth, phone, email, signup_date, signup_type, update_date) VALUES (#{id},sha2(#{pw},256),#{name}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{email}, now(), 'email', NOW())
mapper.select: select Count(*) as count from las_member where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO las_essential_ta ( member_seq, agreed_name, agreed, greed_time ) VALUES (#{memberSeq},#{name}, 1, NOW())
INSERT INTO las_optional_ta ( member_seq, optional_rule_name, agreed, greed_time ) VALUES (#{memberSeq},#{name}, 1, NOW())
